verses.roman:
prabhu kahe,--kara tumi dainya saṁvaraṇa
tomāra dainyete mora vyākula haya mana

synonyms: prabhu kahe—the Lord replied; kara—do; tumi—you; dainya—humility; saṁvaraṇa—checking; tomāra—your; dainyete—by humility; mora—My; vyākula—agitated; haya—becomes; mana—the mind.
translation: The Lord replied to Haridāsa Ṭhākura, "Please check your humility. Just seeing your humility very much agitates My mind."
